fileAccept.description: Function called when the file is accepted

fileReject.description: Function called when the file is rejected

allowDrop.description: Whether to allow drag and drop in the dropzone element

capture.description: The default camera to use when capturing media

directory.description: Whether to accept directories, only works in webkit browsers

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.
